commits.author: Steven Rowe
Robert Muir
commits.sourceNew:
/** * Create field with binary value. * *

NOTE: the provided byte[] is not copied so be sure * not to change it until you're done with this field. * @param name field name * @param value byte array pointing to binary content (not copied) * @param type field type * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the field name is null, * or the field's type is indexed() * @throws NullPointerException if the type is null */ public Field(String name, byte[] value, FieldType type) { this(name, value, 0, value.length, type); }

commits.author: yonik
commits.sourceNew:
/** * Create field with binary value. * *

NOTE: the provided byte[] is not copied so be sure * not to change it until you're done with this field. * @param name field name * @param value byte array pointing to binary content (not copied) * @param type field type * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the field name is null, * or the field's type is indexed() * @throws NullPointerException if the type is null */ public Field(String name, byte[] value, IndexableFieldType type) { this(name, value, 0, value.length, type); }
